article.title: Continuous Diagnostics and Mitigation Planning Guide

content.brief: The Continuous Diagnostics and Mitigation Readiness and Planning Guide for Asset-Based Continuous Diagnostics and Mitigation Security Capabilities proposes practical considerations for departments and agencies to leverage when implementing the Continuous Diagnostics and Mitigation Program asset-based security capabilities.

article.source: United States Computer Emergency Readiness Team
article.subtitle: Continuous Diagnostics and Mitigation: Readiness and Planning Guide for Asset-Based CDM Security Capabilities
